creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: seated man wearing a blue loincloth and an open short kimono with pale red hexagonal designs with blue centers and black trim, looking toward PR; man holds up a fish in his PL hand and holds a knife in his PR hand, with a low pink bench before him, with orange and yellow ovoid objects; blue and white bowl in LLC; screen behind man with moon and squirrel (?)
marks: Signature and Seal Ichiyūsai Kuniyoshi ga
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Sawamura Nōshi  as Shinoda Hanjin
